alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette and Dixie Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1045 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Trenton to 39 miles south of Horseshoe Point. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Horseshoe Point, Suwannee, Horseshoe Beach, Shamrock, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Old Town, Hines, Grady, Hatch Bend, Eugene, Fletcher and Yellow Jacket. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
